tool_description: Compare two pictures and find out how similar they are
name: Similarity
title: Similarity

api_list.name: similarity
api_list.description: Allows you to send 2 images (in base64 or url) and obtain the similarity in normalized percentage between 0.0 and 1.0
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://similarity2.p.rapidapi.com/similarity"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "similarity2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://similarity2.p.rapidapi.com/similarity"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "similarity2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
